name: Butter Chicken
description:
Find out what happens in a bullet hell if the bullets don't despawn.

Help the little chicken defeat the chefs that want to cook this special chicken that has the ability to come back after death and heal itself using butter.

Controls
  • Use w, a, s, d to move.
  • Use left shift to dash
  • Use left click to shoot
  • Heal by picking up yellow butter
